name: Shadow of the Titans
description:
Shadow of the Titans - A game developed and submited to GBJAM 8 .

If you liked the game, make sure to vote there!

Have you played "Shadow of the Colossus" in a time? Or watched "Attack on Titans" at least once?  This game brings the best part of them into one place!

Inspired by those game/anime, Shadow of the Titans is a platform/adventure game that you need to defeat a Titanic Giant Colossus to save your city. 

What put that bad guy in your city? No one knows... However we need to survive!

 

[CONTROLS]

[A], [D]: Move to left and right. 

[W]: Jump.

[S]: Fall down when over platforms.  

Mouse [Left Click]: Use the hook to grab the walls. Clicking again when already hooked, move your hero directly into the hooked place and grab onto the wall. Use it to get high places. 

Mouse [Right Click]: Slice! Use it to attack the Titan and harmful objects when needed. Also cancels the hooked place to throw that again in another part.
